price: Enti εberε a yεtee tenenee no ho asεm no, yεgye dii. Na obi a ͻbεgye Nyankopͻn adie no, ɔnsuro papa ho asisie (sε ne papa so bεteε), anaa bͻne nso ho asisie (sε yεde bͻne a ͻnyͻeε bεma no).
arabic: وَأَنَّا لَمَّا سَمِعۡنَا ٱلۡهُدَىٰٓ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦۖ فَمَن يُؤۡمِنۢ بِرَبِّهِۦ فَلَا يَخَافُ بَخۡسٗا وَلَا رَهَقٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-annā lammā samiʿ'nā al-hudā āmannā bihi faman yu'min birabbihi falā yakhāfu bakhsan walā rahaqan
